comments.body: if this is based on a file from hive, can you say that in the classdoc and explain what the differences are?
Sure. This is based on OrcNewInputFormat.OrcRecordReader (which is marked private). Only addition is the getObjectInspector targeted to reduce namenode calls later.  I will update the doc.
Would be nice to mention the specific version to which the original class belongs.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,94 @@

+package org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc;
+
+import org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration;
+import org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.objectinspector.ObjectInspector;
+import org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable;
+import org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputSplit;
+import org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader;
+import org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TaskAttemptContext;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.util.List;
+
+/**
+ * This is based on
+ * {@link org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.OrcNewInputFormat.OrcRecordReader}.
